channel.title: Writeups on Giorgio Grigolo
channel.description: Recent content in Writeups on Giorgio Grigolo

item.title: kvant
item.description: We all know that quantum computing is the future, so in order to practice my quantum computing skills, I have built my own encoding scheme, then I used it to hide the flag, can you recover it! kvant.py enc.txt This challenge was in the misc category of the first GDG Algiers CTF due to involving quantum computing. In my opinion, a well founded knowledge of cryptography is useful in this challenge as shown later.
